entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 08:00 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -7.4°C

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of drizzle or flurries near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
